content: garter ridge cardigan fits 18 dolls such as gotz or american girl dolls or 15 bitty baby by janice helge this doll cardigan pattern was inspired by the many versions of the precious layettes #1 sweaters that i knit for babies it=s a quick top-down knit 2 oz of cascade 220 superwash about 130 yards or another lighter weight worsted yarn needles size 5 and 7 gauge on size 7 needles 4 5 to 5 stitches = 1 or knit this cardigan on size 5 and 6 needles for a closer fit the yellow cardigans in the photo were knit with lion brand pound of love yarn gauge on size 6 needles is 5 stitches = 1 k/k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together p/p = purl increase = increase by knitting in the front and back of the stitch pm = place maker ssk = slip 1 stitch slip next stitch put both stitches back onto the left needle and knit through the back loops sts = stitches yo = yarn over needle using size 5 needles cast on 44 stitches work 2 row of k1 p1 ribbing buttonhole row 3 see note at end of pattern regarding buttonholes k2 yo k2tog k1 p1 ribbing to end of row change to larger needles row 4 knit row 5 k4 purl to last 4 stitches k4 row 6 k6 *increase in next stitch k2 repeat from * across row to last 4 stitches end k4 56 stitches row 7 and 8 knit row 9 repeat row 5 row 10 k5 *increase in next stitch k3 repeat from * across row to last 6 stitches k6 68 stitches row 11 and 12 knit note row 11 is the second buttonhole row if desired row 13 repeat row 5 row 14 k5 increase in next stitch *k4 increase in next stitch repeat from * across row to last 7 stitches end k7 80 stitches row 15 and 16 knit row 17 repeat row 5 note row 17 is the third buttonhole row if desired row 18 k4 increase in next stitch *k5 increase in next stitch repeat from * across to last 5 stitches increase and end k4 93 stitches row 19 and 20 knit row 21 repeat row 5 row 22 place markers and increase as follows k14 increase pm increase k16 increase pm increase k25 increase pm increase k16 increase pm increase end k14 row 23 repeat row 5 row 24 knit across increasing in the stitch before and after each marker 109 sts row 25 and 26 repeat row 23 and 24 117 stitches divide work wrong side knit 4 purl14 front stitches place 24 sleeve stitches on a holder cast on 2 stitches purl across 33 back stitches cast on 2 stitches place next 24 stitches on a holder for the other sleeve purl across 14 front stitches knit 4 there are now 73 stitches for the body of the sweater on the needle work stockinette
